meanings.definition: Treated or combined with muriatic acid.
meanings.sent1: The muriated solution was used to clean the metal surface.
meanings.sent2: The pool water became muriated after adding the acid.
meanings.sent3: The muriated mixture fizzed like a soda pop!
meanings.sent4: Her words had a muriated effect on his mood, corroding his happiness.
meanings.sent5: The muriated smell in the air was sharp and pungent.
